channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; The Big Hill: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington wants to make a special cake when 'Paddington Celebrates Mrs Bird's Day', then in 'Paddington The Table Tennis Champ', Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team! (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park in 'Paddington Gets Fit', then in 'Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair', Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair accidentally gets broken. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.
